about_the_game:
The age of heroes is over. The time of the villain has come.


Take on the mantle of a villain unlike any other, wielding the power of infernal spells and commanding a legion of demons at your disposal.
Fueled by an unquenchable desire for vengeance, you set out to claim the soul that was promised to you, by any means necessary.
Travel through the mortal kingdom you once ruled, leaving a trail of destruction in your wake as you seek to regain what is rightfully yours.
Kill Ingeniously, and reclaim your rightful place as one of the demon lords. No one will stand in your way, and no one is safe from your wrath.

The age of heroes is over. The time of the villain has come.

DOMINATE THE MORTAL REALM


You are the harbinger of terror and chaos, feared by all who reside in this world. Let the mortals know that challenging your power is a grave mistake, one that will cost them dearly.

Burn villages to the ground, decimate towns, and level cities as you unleash your wrath upon those who oppose you. You are the ultimate force to be reckoned with, a being of unparalleled power and destruction.

HARNESS YOUR ABILITIES


Amass your strength by gathering souls from the mortal realm, growing your demon army and investing their mortal essence into void magic. Unlock powerful dark abilities and rain down destruction and death.

Become the villain

Immerse yourself in a world where the villain reigns supreme and traditional storytelling is turned on its head.
Take control of your own destiny and break free from the chains of mortal expectations. It's time to write your own story, one that's not beholden to the desires and whims of mere mortals


MAIN FEATURES:

• Intense brutal action based combat with over 50 unique abilities
• Destructible Open World
• Physics based interaction
• Rank Arenas with Online Leaderboards
• A rich and diverse world
• Surreal visual setting and gore

content_descriptors.notes: Intense Violence, Blood and Gore, Mild Sexual Themes, Language, Use of Alcohol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-4370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3500x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or AMD RX Vega-56
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Prepare to unleash your inner demon and dominate the mortal realm as the Demon Lord Baphomet! Wreak havoc with a powerful array of demonic spells and abilities to crush cities, towns, and villages, and build your demonic empire to reign supreme over all those who oppose you.
